data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Nógrád, Hungary to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Nógrád, Hungary
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Nógrád, Hungary.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.section_summary: On average, 18 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Nógrád, Hungary.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Nógrád, Hungary.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Nógrád.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Father, 0.1% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Lord, there are 178,875 people in the state of Nógrád who claim Christianity, but may have never read the Bible. Please challenge them today to read the Bible for themselves.
data.verse: All Scripture is God-breathed and is useful for teaching, rebuking, correcting and training in righteousness

data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in Nógrád, Hungary know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Nógrád, Hungary humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

location.name: Nógrád
location.people_groups_list: Vietnamese, Bosniak, Arab, general, Turk, Chinese, general
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Vietnamese (3,300), Bosniak (19,000), Arab, general (5,200), Turk (2,500), Chinese, general (6,400)
